title: Grand Re-Opening: Fiji Adults-Only Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Three-Course Dinners
description:
Stays don’t come more romantic than the newly refurbished Lomani Island Resort, a luxury adults-only retreat nestled on Malolo Lailai island in the glistening waters of the Mamanuca archipelago. Barefoot luxury and island seclusion abound at this tropical sanctuary, where colourful reefs brimming with striking marine life and powdery white sands beckon. With a name that literally translates to ‘love’ (Lomani), this is an escape guaranteed to rekindle the spark.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Indulge with daily breakfast and nightly three-course dinner
- Enjoy a one-time romantic three-course dinner on the beachfront
- Get straight into the Lomani spirit with a bottle of wine, homemade chocolates and cookies waiting for you on arrival
- Toast your escape with daily two-for-one cocktail offers
- Decompress with one 60-minute spa treatment or massage per person and one 15-minute foot massage per person
- Make the most of your experience with complimentary access to equipment including island bicycles, kayaks, stand-up paddleboards and hobie cats
- Enjoy a range of complimentary tours and activities such as dolphin-sighting trips, daily reef snorkelling trips, cultural activities and nightly entertainment
- Plus complimentary turndown and laundry service, and much more

**Beachfront Bure Upgrade:** Only footsteps from Lomani’s own pristine white-sand beach, the standalone Beachfront Bure invites you to stay in 65sqm of pure Fijian luxury with a private sundeck and outdoor shower.

**Private Pool Upgrade:** Experience luxury at its finest in the Beachfront Pool Pure, where you can bask in serene beachfront vistas and cool off in your very own private plunge pool.

**Book with 100% Confidence**: If for whatever reason you don’t want to go on your holiday, you can cancel right up to 14 days before check-in and get a 100% credit to use at Luxury Escapes for any other accommodation offer. Excludes flights, see the Fine Print for details.

**This deal has NO surcharges:** Travel any time for the same great price.

title: Fiji Family-Friendly Beachfront Oasis: Plantation Island Resort with Vibrant Coral Reef, Six Restaurants & FJ$500 Dining Credit
description:
A world of adventure for the whole family awaits at this resort, located in tropical Fiji, on stunning Malolo Lailai island, just 50 minutes from Port Denarau on the ferry. Spanning 23 acres, this exceptional family-friendly resort offers an array of rooms and bures, endless stretches of golden beach and a multitude of activities, from Fijian cooking classes to waterpark fun, promising to keep kids and teens entertained for hours.

Revel in a plethora of activities, from snorkelling in vibrant coral reefs to exploring lush coconut plantations. Dine on fresh seafood at the beachfront restaurant or enjoy a refreshing dip in one of the three sparkling swimming pools. Dotted across the island between lush tropical gardens, each room boasts traditional Fijian influences and has been designed with the whole family in mind while also being an idyllic tropical escape for couples looking to reconnect.

While some rooms offer shared living in one large room, others offer split-level and two-bedroom options. In this tropical island oasis, you can spend all day at the onsite waterpark, indulge in a Fijian massage, play a round of golf or tennis, savour the gourmet delights of seven onsite restaurants and bars or see what’s on at the Kids' Club.

title: Fun Fiji Island Family Escape with Onsite Waterpark, Daily Dining & Roundtrip International Flights with Fiji Airways for Two Adults
description:
A world of adventure for the whole family awaits at Plantation Island Resort, located in the tropical paradise of Fiji, on stunning Malolo Lailai island, just 16 kilometres west of Nadi.

Spanning 23 acres, this exceptional family-friendly resort offers an array of rooms and suites, endless stretches of golden beach and a multitude of activities to keep kids and teens entertained for hours. Dotted across the island between lush tropical gardens, each room boasts traditional Fijian influences and has been designed with the whole family in mind. While some offer shared living in one large room, others offer split-level and two-bedroom options. Throughout your time in this tropical haven, you can plunge into four swimming pools, spend all day at the onsite waterpark, indulge in a Fijian massage, play a round of tennis, savour the gourmet delights of seven onsite restaurants and bars or see what’s on at the Kids' Club (with Lairo Club access for teens 13-16).

title: Fun Fiji Family Escape with Onsite Waterpark, Dining Credit & Massages
description:
A world of adventure for the whole family awaits at Plantation Island Resort, located in the tropical paradise of Fiji, on stunning Malolo Lailai island, just 16 kilometres west of Nadi.

Spanning 23 acres, this exceptional family-friendly resort offers an array of rooms and suites, endless stretches of golden beach and a multitude of activities to keep kids and teens entertained for hours. Dotted across the island between lush tropical gardens, each room boasts traditional Fijian influences and has been designed with the whole family in mind. Throughout your time in this tropical haven, you can plunge into four swimming pools, spend all day at the onsite waterpark, indulge in a Fijian massage, play a round of tennis or see what’s on at the Kids' Club.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Bring the family: up to two children (12 and under) stay free
- Indulge with FJD$250 dining credit per package per stay
- Unwind in style and enjoy a 60-minute couples’ massage per stay
- Celebrate your stay with a welcome cocktail per adult on arrival
- Endless fun awaits with complimentary Kids' Club access
- Unleash your fun side with unlimited access to the onsite kids and adults-only waterpark

**Need more privacy?** Upgrade to a split-level Ocean-View Hotel Room or Two Bedroom Garden Bure.

**Book with 100% Confidence:** Right up until 14 days before check-in you can enjoy unlimited, free date changes, or cancel and get a 100% credit to use at Luxury Escapes for any other Limited Time Lux Exclusive accommodation, tour or cruise offer. Excludes flights, see the Fine Print for details.

title: Adults-Only Fiji All-Suite Retreat on Malolo Lailai with Freshwater Swimming Pool
description:
Stays don’t come more romantic than the newly refurbished Lomani Island Resort, a luxury adults-only retreat nestled on Malolo Lailai Island in the glistening waters of the Mamanuca archipelago. Barefoot luxury and island seclusion abound at this tropical sanctuary, where colourful reefs brimming with striking marine life and powdery white sands beckon. With a name that literally translates to ‘love’ (lomani), this is an escape guaranteed to rekindle the spark or celebrate your connection.

There’s romance and adventure to be had among otherworldly coral reefs, in glass-bottom kayaks, surfing, dining under the stars and in the freshwater swimming pool. Located on Malolo Lailai, the Mamanuca’s second-largest island, Lomani Island Resort offers quiet elegance and relaxation. Each day, be the first to leave meandering tracks in the powder-white sand.
